Job Seeking Information (English)
About Me:

Hello, my name is Ninna. I am a Canadian currently residing in Singapore. I have 4 years of experience in AI product design and team management. I have won several international design awards (such as Red Dot, French Design Award, Muse Award, etc.). I have experience in starting companies from scratch and leading teams, having successfully implemented several industrial AI projects.

Desired Position:

I am currently looking for a remote UI/UX design position in North America. If there are any opportunities that suit my qualifications, please feel free to contact me. Thank you very much!

Contact Information:

Email: ninna@example.com
Website: www.ninnacao.com
